sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card class="pb-3">
        <v-card-title>Empresa</v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>
            <v-tabs>
                <v-tabs-slider></v-tabs-slider>
                <v-tab>Informações Empresa</v-tab>
                <v-tab-item>
                    <v-form class="px-7">
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Razão Social"
                        />
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Cnpj"
                        />
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Telefone"
                        />
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Email"
                        />
                    </v-form>
                </v-tab-item>
                <v-tab>Configuracoes Empresa</v-tab>
                <v-tab-item>
                    <v-form class="px-7">
                        <v-dialog
                            ref="dialog"
                            v-model="modal2"
                            :return-value.sync="timeInicial"
                            persistent
                            width="290px"
                        >
                            <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                            <v-text-field
                                v-model="timeInicial"
                                label="Horário"
                                prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
                                readonly
                                v-bind="attrs"
                                v-on="on"
                                :rules="requiredRules"
                                color="green"
                            ></v-text-field>
                            </template>
                            <v-time-picker
                                v-if="modal2"
                                v-model="timeInicial"
                                full-width
                                format="24hr"
                                required
                                color="green"
                            >
                            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                            <v-btn
                                text
                                @click="modal2 = false"
                            >
                                Cancelar
                            </v-btn>
                            <v-btn
                                text
                                color="green"
                                @click="$refs.dialog.save(time)"
                            >
                                OK
                            </v-btn>
                            </v-time-picker>
                        </v-dialog>
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Cnpj"
                        />
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Telefone"
                        />
                        <v-text-field
                            label="Email"
                        />
                    </v-form>
                </v-tab-item>
            </v-tabs>
        </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: "ConfiguracoesEmpresaComponent",
    data: () => ({
        modal2: false,
        timeInicial: null,
        requiredRules: [
            v => v != null || 'Campo Obrigatório.',
        ]
    })
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
